channel.title: Redis on 洛七的摸鱼池塘
channel.description: Recent content in Redis on 洛七的摸鱼池塘

item.title: Redis 离线安装
item.description: 下载 需要以下内容 redis make build-essential pkg-config libdpkg-perl 安装 tar -zxvf redis-7.2.2.tar.gz cd redis-7.2.2 make test && make # Command 'make' not found, but can be installed with: # sudo apt install make # version 4.3-4.1build1, or # sudo apt install make-guile # version 4.3-4.1build1 # 因此需要为离线环境安装 make sudo apt-get download make # 这里能下下来 make 所需的 deb 包, 到时候迁移到离线环境 sudo dpkg -i make_4.3-4.1build1_amd64.deb # 然后再回到 redis 进行测试 sudo make test && make # /bin/sh: 1: cc: not found # make[1]: *** [Makefile:436: adlist.
